Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Add SSH setup to warm-pool onstart & fix Windows NUL file bug

- warm-pool.js: Add SSH directory setup to onstart command for proper key handling
- Fix PowerShell scripts using /dev/null on Windows \(creates NUL file bug\)
- Change all SSH UserKnownHostsFile from /dev/null to nul \(Windows null device\)
- Affected files:
  - one-click-start-fixed.ps1
  - one-click-start.ps1
  - scripts/powershell/check-and-install-missing.ps1
  - scripts/powershell/investigate-failures.ps1

This ensures instances provision correctly with custom gist script and prevents
reserved device name files from being created in the project root.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
